thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfy and Great location!
thread.title_full: Comfy and Great location! - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: E1149UZjoanc
title: Comfy and Great location!
text: Just what we needed in our trip to NY. Nice room and near enough to walk to all the sites--theaters, restaurants, churches, museums, shopping. Very comfortable bed! Friendly staff, good coffee and a welcoming atmosphere. They were very helpful in guiding our time in NY.
